attributes.contentHtml:
MCKingSam You are correct Mr Sam, all the data that he's collected is at risk- publicly shaming him could make him do more stupid things (because that makes ittwle bwad angwy?!) so it's quite useless, people still use FalixNodes after all the stuff that Lamaker pulled, so why would people trust Lamaker when it just looks like he's trying to make people use his host instead.

Shutting down the operation internally would probably be better than letting it continue.

attributes.bio: my cover is a cars meme I found on facebook

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer

attributes.contentHtml: Tomas Indeed. He is a child, so does need to learn. I recommend that everyone who reads this submits a report to the domain registrar of althost.cloud and to all server providers and explain to them that the owner of them is underage (not GDPR complaint)
